description: It works great for what it is trying to do, Share screen with audio on discord and it does it super well. there are some bugs that you wouldn't have in the normal version of discord. however they are not that major or a big of a deal.
As of the latest update the app no longer works. It just displays a black screen. Before everythig but watching streams worked just fine.
its easy to use but you are not able to use discord rich pressence apart from that it does what it sets out to do

Pros
-No lag
-Less unused features (Better performance)
-60 fps streaming with audio at a great quality
Cons:
-Cannot minimize to a tray
-Lack of features
-UI is sometimes choppy when looking at settings

I've been daily driving this client pretty much the day it was added to Flathub and I'm absolutely in love. It has some quirks, at least on Nvidia (both for x11 and Wayland, different quirks for each though). But for what it's worth, it's exactly as they say; an experimental client with audiosharing. Can't believe these madmen did it before Discord themselves. The day the all the weird growing pain glitches get ironed out will make this client officially better than the official one in almost every way.
summary: Not perfect, but exactly as advertized

description: It lacks some features and is a bit laggy but it does stream audio. If it gets polished it will be even better than official discord client
The default Discord client doesn't work. This does. End of story.
summary: Better Than the Discord Client on Steam Deck

description: Scrolling is bugged, otherwise works fine
summary: Scrolling is bugged, otherwise works fine

description:
It works a lot better than the small number of reviews led me to expect. Or even the application icon, which gives me a good laugh every time I look at it. My friend and I nicknamed the poor little icon "Cord" (as opposed to Discord).

Whatever the case, it does exactly what I wanted, which was stream a game from my steam deck including the audio. 🎉
not working its 720p and 30fps
Unfortunately audio was the only thing that worked, video was just a black screen.
The regular discord client is broken. This is not. 1 star off cuz the ui is really laggy on wayland, it's fine on x tho, at least from my experience.
good app would recommend

The audio works well, but the GPU acceleration flag is not enabled in this build so the video only looks smooth at 480p 30fps or less as the CPU has to do all the encoding. Anything higher causes a lot of frame drops in the stream.
Its awesome the work you did with pipewire, to be 100% you need to add the option to capture a specific screen, due to discord-wayland bull.
A lot of people are saying that it shows a black screen, but that's just an issue with Gaming Mode, works just fine in Desktop mode.
Can't wait for Steam Deck gaming mode/black screen error to be fixed! You're doing God's work :D
Finally an easy way to get streaming audio working

It works somewhat. 
-It doesn't keep the size, it always default to a smaller size, which I can always increase, but it's annoying and tedious. 
-Whenever I am on a tab of a DM, and I resize discord there, it crashes.
-I don't see my minimize and maximize anymore. It only shows as a fullscreen borderless
-resizing of discord is control + scroll wheel instead of control + -/+

My system: Laptop (nVidia gpu + intel cpu), Fedora 37, KDE (Wayland).

And it perfectly works. I've just tested it, so maybe some bugs will be found later.
summary: Works like a charm (at first glance)

description:
User beware, this will change your password upon logging into this modded Discord client. It has happened to me on two occasions when trying to use this program. Luckily no damage was done and I was able to change my password and swap out my backup codes, but there is still a very real risk of getting locked out of your account due to using this software.

If you're going to use it, use it with a secondary account you don't mind losing. You have been warned.
everything is pretty much good but the only problem for me is only being able to stream the whole screen instead of 1 window, if they added that it would be perfect!
AMAZING!! BETTER THAN THE ORIGINAL I SWEAR
works really well

Straight away, plug and play, very easy.
I struggled a lot searching for simple solutions to share my screen and audio and this did it in spades. Thanks for making this!

I only logged into a burner account to stream via this app, it worked great, but surprise surprise, I got an email that a random Canadian IP logged into this account a month later, stay far away or use a burner account as well

Additionals to allow reliable audio and video capture. Essential if you want to stream to friends with Fedora 38 / Wayland. 

It does have some minor shortcomings as of 2023-09. (1) It can be difficult to grab and resize the Discord window. (2) Have to restart stream if you want to chance quality or resolution (3) Pressing the launcher will detect if it's already open and bring that window to the for, instead it will launch a second instance. (4) There are no try icons. 

Functionality over the default package more than make up for these deficiencies.
Working well on GNOME Wayland without major adjustments, this may be the best discord client because it supports audio screensharing
summary: Working well on Wayland without major adjustments

description: Feels like stock discord client.. seems to work well. Discord flatpak loves to break every so often so need other solutions to switch too. I also enjoyed Webcord but it also breaks frequently.
where is the activity settings so it can show that im playing a game

Finally I can show my screen and sounds to my friends.
Ofc, sometimes it has some laggs, but it's okey)
Sound on screen demos doesn't work, and now the program doesn't run at all after startup
keeps loading and wont let me join calls, was working fine until today
Like another reviewer here has already said, it was working fine until today. It's endlessly stuck on loading
probably one of my most important apps, a bummer it suddenly stopped working. same as the other reviewers, just started happening

Today (October 25th, 2023) the discord-screenaudio app stopped working entirely. For context, I was in a voice channel on a server on mobile moments prior: I turned on my steamdeck and went into desktop mode with the intention of screensharing something to some friends. discord-screenaudio opened to the friends list but showed noone as online. When clicking on the server, General Chat loaded and was up to date, but the voice channels were empty and if I clicked on either the chat box or a voice channel to join, Discord would immediately crash to the "Well, this is awkward." screen. No number of uninstalls and supposed user data wipes or system restarts fixed this problem.
summary: Great alternative client, but no longer works for me

description: Worked fine until right now when it just crashes when I do anything.
Infinite load screen
no one can hear me despite it working in the normal app

This client is pretty good, but it is unable to maximize on portrait-orientated monitors. This would normally be a deal breaker for me as I can't put my second monitor in landscape without obstructing a speaker, but the only two clients that can maximize on portrait-orientated monitors (Armcord and Webcord) are currently plauged by fatal bugs that prevent them from starting
summary: Works all right, but can't maximize on portrait orientated monitor

description: after the update to fix the past issues, it seems to crash upon clicking the emoji icon.
summary: overall fixed with one small issue

description: When i click emoji's/gifs the app crashes and if it closes for any reason i get loged out
It works better than on Windows, you can share the entire screen with all the sound or a specific application. Amazing
Straight up just refuses to start when it doesn't feel like it. If I'm lucky, it'll show something that isn't the discord gray background color.

I'm glad someone was finally able to get discord streaming to work properly. It's a little hit or miss sometimes.

I also noticed a bug where if you open a video attachment in full screen, the screen just goes white and the app stops responding. When you quit the app and load it up again, the whole app is stuck in fullscreen mode with no way to get it out. The only thing that fixes it for me is to totally uninstall the flatpack and reinstall it.

I'm on fedora 39 btw.
summary: A nice alternative to the default app

description: I can stream audio, I ask for nothing more

I love the app! But there is one MAJOR issue.... I cannot fullscreen videos (from youtube or uploaded directly) without having the app completely freeze up on me. The freeze makes the app unusable & is basically permanent. Closing the app & re-launching it doesn't fix it. Only way to restore functionality is to completely re-install the app...
Not sure why but my microphone input gets all messed up when I use this discord client.
Hopefully there will be an update that allows this to work through game mode one day; other than that, seems to work fine for me on desktop mode
summary: Good, But Doesn't Work On Game Mode

description:
Issue number 1 -> I would get disconnected for no apparent reason, seem to happen a lot more if i was streaming (720p 30fps which is discord standard)

Issue number 2 -> since last month a delay of 0.5 to 1 second between the time i talk and my audio being delivered (green circle)

Otherwise the experience was fine I could stream easily but there was also some times where the stream would freeze on the viewer's end
summary: Fine but some issues appeared after 3 months of use

description: Been using this since I got my SteamDeck and it worked fine for months. Recently came back to discover that viewing shared screens, one of the main reasons to use this over the official version, no longer works. I can hear their streams but viewing them is completely broken. Sharing screens and audio still works.
summary: Viewing Shared Screens No Longer Works

description: After being frustrated with the official Discord, I saw some recommendations for this. I screenshare a lot with my friends and after the move to Linux, this was one of the things I couldn't do, until now. Works flawlessly if your primary concern is screensharing.
summary: Able to screen share WITH audio!

description: the only reason to have this app is for screenshare audio but as of recently it doesn't work in dms. it still works in servers for some reason. shame
can't even change the quality of the stream either
Not sure what's happened, but when I go to stream, I can no longer choose what window I want to stream, nor the quality I can stream at. Audio also doesn't work.

Worked great until roughly last month. Issue one is that I can no longer see the server voice channel screen when in vc, its pure black and can only see the sidebar options. Issue two relates to the previous by no longer allowing me to watch other people's streams while using this. Issue three is that there is no longer an option to change my stream settings (quality, which screen, audio output, etc.) and lastly when streaming no audio is picked up anymore. Please update if possible to resolve these issues as this application was amazing previously. Thank you!

Upon attempting to screenshare, you will no longer be presented with a popup box that gives you the options to pick resolution and framerate for the stream, instead, the screenshare will automatically open to just a black screen for both the broadcaster and viewer
the new refresh update seemed to fix the problem of not being able to watch other peoples screen share! thanks!
summary: new update fixes screen share issue!

description: Most recent update broke the app, so hoping this gets fixed soon; however for the most part this has been one of the more reliable discord apps overall for Nobara builds.
summary: One of the better discord flatpaks on Nobara

description: Screen sharing works but Krisp is not working in this Client.
Es una solución ingeniosa pero a efectos practicos sería ideal que estuviera integrado en pulseaudio o pipewire como una entrada de sonido que no sea el microfono.
приложение заебись, но иконка говно, переделывайте

Как я понял, это просто веб-версия дискорда, но сделанная в виде приложения с поддержкой стримов. Поддерживаются разрешения от 240p до 2160p, от 15fps до 144fps. 

Из минусов: не всегда запускаются стримы. Приходится перезаходить. Стримы в 144fps ооочень редко работают (у меня 144hz монитор), но будем честны: они нахой не нужны. 
Веб-камера вообще не работает. Приходится перезаходить в обычный дискорд и ожидать эрекцию, из-за плавного скролла, естественно.
summary: Круто, даже мой любимый Wayland работает, но есть нюансы

description: В целом неплохо, но могло быть и лучше. Есть баги со стримами и звуком. Демка с высоким качеством лагает у смотрящих.
summary: Fine enough. But could be better

description: Thank you very much! It just works.
Discord just crashes
Не работает стрим экрана. Теперь нету окна показа экрана. Выбрать формат невозможно. Звук попросту не транслируется
